page.title: 04What is Spoken in Newport.
page.content: I think many people think that Newport has very little Welsh spoken.We are taught both English and Welsh from our first day at school and we learn some things through Welsh.Grown-ups also have a chance of learning it in evening class.I think it is only about 12 children that sometimes play in Welsh.We don't use any other language.We get a terrible row for bad language,it's nearly as bad as stealing or telling lies!We don't get a row for not speaking Welsh,the teachers nag us a lot to try more but it is difficult unless we are Llangrannog Urdd Camp or Pendine on a Welsh course.We can understand nearly everything. Everybody in Newport answered questions:45% had both parents speaking Welsh;38%now speak fluent,20% fair,17% understand only,25% no Welsh.
